message: bhai ami shibir korina ami chatrodhol ar rajnithi kori kintu ami jamather nithi r adhorsho ke somman kori.bangladeshe akmatrto chatroshibir e porichonno chatro rajnithi kore ami medhabi chatronetha porichonno chatro rajnithir ohonkar Delowar vai ke grefthar ar tibro ninda janai and obilombe unar nishortho mukti chai (one of our fan messeged us)
